titles.title: Congratulating the Carroll College Fighting Saints football team for winning the 2007 NAIA National Championship.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and Labor.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Higher Education, Lifelong Learning, and Competitiveness.

bill.summary: 12/18/2007--Introduced. Congratulates the Carroll College Fighting Saints football team for winning the 2007 National Association of Intercollegiate Athletics National Championship.
